sen.j: 山津照神社（やまつてるじんじゃ）は滋賀県米原市にある神社である。
sen.e: Yamatsuteru-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.
Yamatsuteru-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: that existsをlocatedに変更しました。
sen.e: Yamatsuteru-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture.
It is not unknown when it was built.
It is not unknown when it was built.
It is not unknown when it was built.

sen.j: 延喜式神名帳に記載されている式内社である。
sen.e: It is a Shikinai-sha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) listed in Jinmyocho (the list of deities) of Engishiki (codes and procedures on national rites and prayers).
It is a Shikinai-sha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) listed in Jinmyocho (the list of deities) of Engishiki (codes and procedures on national rites and prayers).
It is a Shikinai-sha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) listed in Jinmyocho (the list of deities) of Engishiki (codes and procedures on national rites and prayers).

sen.j: 仁寿元年正六位、貞観 (日本)8年正四位下の神階を賜ったという記録が残る。
sen.e: There is a record that in 851 the shrine was given Shorokui (Senior Sixth Rank) and in 866 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
There is a record that in 851 the shrine was given Shorokui (Senior Sixth Rank) and in 866 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
There is a record that in 851 the shrine was given Shorokui (Senior Sixth Rank) and in 866 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 明治14年郷社、大正10年に県社に列格した。
sen.e: In 1861 it was given the title of gosha (village shrine) and in 1921 was promoted to prefectural shrine.
In 1861 it was given the title of gosha (village shrine) and in 1921 was promoted to prefectural shrine.
In 1861 it was given the title of gosha (village shrine) and in 1921 was promoted to prefectural shrine.

sen.j: 境内には古墳群があり、県史跡に指定されている。
sen.e: There is a burial mounds designated as the prefectural site.
On the temple grounds, there are burial mounds in the designated as the prefectural site.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れを追記し、複数形に修正しました。
sen.e: On the temple grounds, there are burial mounds designated as the prefectural site.

sen.cmt: 大文字に変更しました。
